attributes.action: Reopen Covid secure gyms across the country regardless of Covid tier
attributes.additional_details: Gyms are have great beneficial effects for both physical and mental health. During the winter months in particular, it is not always feasible or desirable to exercise outdoors, because of weather conditions, underfoot conditions or personal safety issues.
attributes.background: Gyms have been shown by PHE statistics to be safe places and not vectors of infection. The Government should therefore, follow the science and keep gyms open.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Prevent gyms closing due to a spike in Covid 19 cases: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/333869

Keep gyms and leisure facilities open during any lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/556956
